summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Lakeside Avenue South, from a connection with Lake Washington Boulevard South, south of Holgate Street, to the north line of Yesler Way produced easterly; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14940 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
